response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $1,500,000. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. We propose to sell this product to you for $1,350,000. This price not only ensures a substantial return for us but also presents an excellent opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of conducting this transaction. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
